content: Reminder this one is an hour earlier than our usual talks 2024-06-19T13:00:00+00:00. Really looking forward to it!

From Urs:

"""
Abstract: I will give a very basic introduction to the use of higher
topos theory in fundamental physics,
along the lines of my EMP article
"""

So if anyone wants, you can do some reading and prepare! :)

Recording, slides, etc. now in the dropbox folder!

Urs extends his gratitude for being invited and for everyone listening. He might share the talk recording publicly, just fyi.
I hope he does. Urs has a YouTube channel where he sticks talks: https://www.youtube.com/@UrsSchreiber
